Returns matching languages

resolve_lang.Rd

Returns matching languages

Usage

resolve_lang(languages, target_language)

Arguments

languages

a character vector of languages.

target_language

a single character string with the desired language.

Value

a logical vector of the same length as languages indicating which language is a match for the target_language

Details

This should take into account the ISO hierarchy. i.e.: if target_language is "es_AR", then "es" is good, but "es_AR" is better. if target language is "es", then "es_AR" is also good.

Right now it returns TRUE for exact matches only and if there are no matches, it returns TRUE for elements in language that have the same root language as target_language. So if target_language is "es_AR", then "es_UY", "es_ES" and "es" will all return TRUE.
